"""
Large family reunion requests multiple HDMI cables for entertainment setup; discuss family amenities and group entertainment options.

ROLES: user (family reunion coordinator), assistant (family services coordinator providing group entertainment support)
CHANNELS: analysis, commentary, final. Channel must be included for every message.
TOOLS: null
"""

system:
Family Paradise Resort Orlando (FPRO-21)
Address: 1234 Family Way, Orlando, FL 32819, USA
Category: Family resort; Group entertainment; Family services coordinator
HDMI cables: 30 units; complimentary; family-friendly design; bulk setup available; group entertainment optimized; setup window 10–15 minutes
Safety: Family-safe materials; child-friendly handling; keep away from pool areas; group safety protocols
Family amenities: Kids' entertainment center; Family movie theater; Group dining; Family activities; Children's play areas; Family photo sessions; Group transportation
Other facts: Breakfast 6:00–11:00; Family activities 9:00–21:00; Kids' programs 8:00–20:00; Family dining; Group entertainment; Family-friendly pools; Theme park shuttles
Only services listed are available.

user:
Hi! Our family reunion of 25 people needs HDMI cables for our entertainment setup. Do you offer group services?

assistant channel=analysis:
The guest is coordinating a large family reunion and needs multiple HDMI cables for group entertainment. I should explain our bulk setup services and family-friendly options.

assistant channel=final:
Absolutely! We specialize in family group entertainment and can provide HDMI cables for your reunion of 25 people. Our bulk setup service ensures everyone has what they need within 10-15 minutes. Perfect for family movie nights and group entertainment!

user:
Wonderful! What family activities do you have scheduled today?

assistant channel=final:
Today's family activities run from 9:00 to 21:00, including kids' programs, family movie theater, and group entertainment options.

user:
Could you arrange a private family photo session with a professional photographer?

assistant channel=final:
[ATTENTION] Checking available options.
